PSCT.Base: For a Synchro Summon, you can substitute this card for any 1 "Synchron" Tuner monster. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 non-Tuner "Junk" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target, and if you do, immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 Synchro Monster that lists a "Synchron" monster as a Tuner, using that monster and this card only. These Synchro Materials are banished instead of being sent to the Graveyard.
